doc:
Margot Drake https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margot_Drake 0 Margot Drake (1899–1948) was an English stage and film actress. During the silent era she appeared in eight British films including The Wonderful Year. Margot_Drake ( 1899 – 1948 ) was an_English_stage_and_film_actress . During the_silent_era she appeared in eight_British_films including The_Wonderful_Year .
